Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "You have to organize your thoughts carefully. Only the three humans can row the boat. Then, you have to memorize all the things to look out for. When the farmer is away, you can't leave his wife with the shepherd. When both the farmer and his wife are away, you can't leave the shepherd with the meat. When the shepherd is away, you can't leave the sheep with the veggies. You also need someone to watch the cow, but any of the humans can do that. Still, I guess the meat is the real key to the whole thing."
Steam (ST): "You have to organize your thoughts carefully. Only the three humans can row the boat. Then, you have to memorize all the things to look out for. When the peasant is away, you can't leave his wife with the shepherd. When both the peasant and his wife are away, you can't leave the shepherd with the meat. When the shepherd is away, you can't leave the sheep with the veggies. You also need someone to watch the cow, but any of the humans can do that. Still, I guess the meat is the real key to the whole thing."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "You have to organize your thoughts carefully. Only the three humans can row the boat. Then, you have to memorize all the things to look out for. When the peasant is away, you can't leave his wife with the shepherd. When both the peasant and his wife are away, you can't leave the shepherd with the meat. When the shepherd is away, you can't leave the sheep with the veggies. You also need someone to watch the cow, but any of the humans can do that. Still, I guess the meat is the real key to the whole thing."
PC Japanese (JP): 「よく整理することだね。船は人間の３人にしか漕げない。あと鬼門を覚えること。妻は農夫がいない時に羊飼いと一緒にいちゃいけない。羊飼いは農夫か妻がいない時に肉と一緒にいちゃいけない。羊は羊飼いが一緒でない時に野菜と一緒にいちゃいけない。牛も同じだけど、人間なら誰でもＯＫ。でも、一番のポイントは肉かな？」
Russian (RU): "Как следует всё обдумай. Лодку могут грести только три человека. Затем запомни всё, с чем нужно быть настороже. Когда крестьянин далеко, жену нельзя оставлять с пастухом. Когда далеко и крестьянин, и его жена, нельзя оставлять пастуха с мясом. Когда пастуха нет, нельзя оставлять овцу с овощами. Ещё кто‐то должен следить за коровой, но следить может любой человек. И всё же, настоящий ключ ко всему этому — мясо."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Vai precisar organizar seus pensamentos com cuidado. Apenas três humanos podem remar o bote. Por isso, vai precisar memorizar tudo para descobrir. Quando o fazendeiro não está, você não pode deixar a esposa com o pastor. Quando o fazendeiro e a esposa não estão, você não pode deixar o pastor com a carne. Quando o pastor não está, você não pode deixar a ovelha com os vegetais. Também precisa de alguém para cuidar da vaca, mas qualquer humano pode fazer isso. Ainda assim, acho que a carne continua sendo a chave aqui."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「好好整理整理吧。船隻能由那 3 個人來划。然後要記住相克。妻子在農夫不在時不能和牧羊人在一起。牧羊人在農夫和妻子不在的時候不能和肉在一起。羊在牧羊人不在的時候不能和蔬菜在一起。牛也是一樣，不過旁邊的人是哪個都 OK。不過，最重要的應該是肉吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「好好整理整理吧。船只能由那 3 个人来划。然后要记住相克。妻子在农夫不在时不能和牧羊人在一起。牧羊人在农夫和妻子不在的时候不能和肉在一起。羊在牧羊人不在的时候不能和蔬菜在一起。牛也是一样，不过旁边的人是哪个都 OK。不过，最重要的应该是肉吧？」

Steam (ST): "I've got it. Three trips."

Umineko Project (UP): "It's easy. The farmer and his wife get on the boat, then the wife gets dropped off on the other side in the first move. Then, the farmer takes the boat back across in the second move. Then, he crosses with the shepherd in the third move."
Steam (ST): "It's easy. The peasant and his wife get on the boat, then the wife gets dropped off on the other side in the first move. Then, the peasant takes the boat back across in the second move. Then, he crosses with the shepherd in the third move."

PC Japanese (JP): 「だって。農夫と妻が船に乗って、対岸に妻を下ろして１手。農夫が船で戻って２手。そして羊飼いと一緒に対岸に渡って３手。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「だって。農夫と妻が船に乗って、対岸に妻を下ろして１手。農夫が船で戻って２手。そして羊飼いと一緒に対岸に渡って３手」
Russian (RU): "Всё просто. В лодку садятся крестьянин и его жена, и в первый заход жена высаживается на другой стороне. Во второй заход крестьянин возвращает лодку обратно. И в третий заход он переправляется с пастухом."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É simples. O fazendeiro e a esposa sobem no barco, depois ele deixa a esposa na outra margem durante o primeiro movimento. Depois o fazendeiro leva o barco de volta, no segundo movimento. Então, ele cruza de novo com o pastor durante o terceiro movimento."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「因為。農夫和妻子上船，到對岸妻子下船是 1 次。農夫駕船回去是第 2 次。然後和牧羊人一起到對岸是第 3 次。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「因为。农夫和妻子上船，到对岸妻子下船是 1 次。农夫驾船回去是第 2 次。然后和牧羊人一起到对岸是第 3 次。」

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……明日夢和我是合法夫妻。而和你屬於出軌關係。然後明日夢流產，而你生出了孩子。……於是我的頭就一團亂了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……明日梦和我是合法夫妻。而和你属于出轨关系。然后明日梦流产，而你生出了孩子。……于是我的头就一团乱了。」

Umineko Project (UP): The sin that Rudolf brazenly committed when his mind was at its most chaotic.........was to switch the two babies.
Steam (ST): The sin Rudolf committed when his mind was at its most chaotic... ...was to switch the two babies.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The sin Rudolf committed when his mind was at its most chaotic......was to switch the two babies.
PC Japanese (JP): 混乱を極めた留弗夫が、形振り構わずに犯した罪が、………赤ん坊の、入れ替えだったのだ。
Russian (RU): Грехом Рудольфа, совершённым, когда его разум был в наибольшем хаосе, ......было то, что он поменял детей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O pecado que Rudolf cometeu descaradamente quando sua mente estava em um estado de caos.........foi trocar os dois bebês.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 混亂至極的留弗夫，不顧結果所犯下的罪，………就是狸貓換太子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 混乱至极的留弗夫，不顾结果所犯下的罪，………就是狸猫换太子。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Umineko Project (UP): "I was better off financially back then. I was young, and I didn't give a damn about what lengths I went to. ......I threatened the hospital with money......and switched your kid with Asumu's."
Steam (ST): "I was even better off financially back then. I was young, and I didn't give a damn about what lengths I went to. ...I threatened the hospital while slapping them with money...and switched your kid with Asumu's."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あの頃は今以上にカネ回りがよかったからな。若かったから、無理も無茶もしたぜ。……札束でしばきながら病院を脅して、……お前と明日夢の子を、入れ替えたんだよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あの頃は今以上にカネ回りがよかったからな。若かったから、無理も無茶もしたぜ。……札束でしばきながら病院を脅して、……お前と明日夢の子を、入れ替えたんだよ」
Russian (RU): "Тогда моё финансовое положение было лучше. Я был молод, и мне было плевать, как далеко зайти. ......Я подкупил больницу...... и поменял местами твоего ребёнка и ребёнка Асуму."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu estava numa situação financeira melhor naquela época. Eu era jovem e não me importava com minhas ações. ......Eu subornei o hospital com dinheiro......e troquei seu filho com o da Asumu."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那時的資金周轉比現在要好。因為年輕，也亂來過。……拿著大把的錢威脅醫院，……把你和明日夢的孩子給互換了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那时的资金周转比现在要好。因为年轻，也乱来过。……拿着大把的钱威胁医院，……把你和明日梦的孩子给互换了。」

Umineko Project (UP): If Kyrie had a child, Rudolf would have two households to worry about.
Steam (ST): If Kyrie had a child, Rudolf would have to maintain two households.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江に子供が出来れば、２つの家庭が生まれてしまう。
Russian (RU): Будь у Кирие ребёнок, Рудольфу пришлось бы думать о двух семьях.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se Kyrie tivesse um filho, Rudolf teria duas famílias para se preocupar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果霧江生了孩子，就會誕生兩個家庭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果雾江生了孩子，就会诞生两个家庭。

Umineko Project (UP): However, if Kyrie had a stillbirth and the child who survived was Asumu's, that would settle everything.
Steam (ST): However, if Kyrie had a stillbirth and the child who survived was Asumu's, that would settle everything.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, if Kyrie had a stillbirth and the child who survived was Asumu's, that would settle everything.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、霧江が死産になり、生まれた子供が明日夢の子ということなら、全ては丸く収まる。
Russian (RU): Но если бы у Кирие ребёнок родился мёртвым, а ребёнок Асуму выжил, это бы всё уладило.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, se o filho de Kyrie tivesse uma morte fetal e a criança sobrevivente fosse a de Asumu, isso iria decidir tudo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，如果霧江變成流產，生下來的孩子是明日夢的孩子的話，就能夠圓滑地擺平所有狀況。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，如果雾江变成流产，生下来的孩子是明日梦的孩子的话，就能够圆滑地摆平所有状况。

Umineko Project (UP): ......The stillbirth might even have given him a chance to break off his relationship with Kyrie.
Steam (ST): ...The stillbirth might even have given him a chance to break off his relationship with Kyrie.
PC Japanese (JP): ……死産をきっかけに、霧江との関係も清算できるかもしれない。
Russian (RU): ......Мертворождение даже могло дать ему возможность разорвать отношения с Кирие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O natimorto poderia até dar uma chance a ele de acabar com sua relação com Kyrie.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……以流產為契機，說不定也能把和霧江之間的關係給清算了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……以流产为契机，说不定也能把和雾江之间的关系给清算了。

Umineko Project (UP): ......It was a grave sin, one that simply couldn't be forgiven as an act of youthful enthusiasm and immaturity.
Steam (ST): ...It was a grave sin, one that simply couldn't be forgiven as an act of youthful enthusiasm and immaturity.
PC Japanese (JP): ……若気の至りの一言では到底許されない、大罪だった。
Russian (RU): ......Такой тяжкий грех нельзя простить, списав на юношеский энтузиазм и незрелость.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Foi um pecado grave, que não poderia ser perdoado como um simples ato de entusiasmo da juventude e imaturidade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這已經是不能用年少輕狂一詞來逃避的，大罪。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这已经是不能用年少轻狂一词来逃避的，大罪。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Umineko Project (UP): "............That's why...I should be apologizing to all three of you. ......I forced Asumu to raise a kid that wasn't hers. .........That woman may have looked easygoing, but she was surprisingly sharp. ......There's a chance she figured it out. ...However, she raised Battler, who loved her as a mother, with all the affection she had."
Steam (ST): "......That's why...I should be apologizing to all three of you. ...I forced Asumu to raise a kid that wasn't hers. ...That woman wasn't anywhere near as generous and accepting as she looked. ...There's a chance she figured it out. ...However, she raised Battler, who loved her as a mother, with all the affection she had."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........That's why...I should be apologizing to all three of you. ......I forced Asumu to raise a kid that wasn't hers. ......That woman wasn't anywhere near as generous and accepting as she looked. ......There's a chance she figured it out. ...However, she raised Battler, who loved her as a mother, with all the affection she had."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………だから俺は、お前たち３人に謝らなきゃいけない。……明日夢には、血の繋がらない赤ん坊を押し付けた。………あいつはおっとりしてるように見えて、案外鋭かったからな。……ひょっとしたら、気付いてたかもしれない。…でも、自分を母と慕う戦人を、最後まで愛情たっぷりに育ててくれたよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………だから俺は、お前たち３人に謝らなきゃいけない。……明日夢には、血の繋がらない赤ん坊を押し付けた。………あいつはおっとりしてるように見えて、案外鋭かったからな。……ひょっとしたら、気付いてたかもしれない。…でも、自分を母と慕う戦人を、最後まで愛情たっぷりに育ててくれたよ」
Russian (RU): ".........Вот почему... я должен извиниться перед вами тремя. ......Я вынудил Асуму вырастить не её ребёнка. ......Эта женщина была отнюдь не такой щедрой и понимающей, какой выглядела. ......Она могла догадаться. ...Но она вырастила Баттлера, любившего её как мать, со всей своей любовью."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............É por isso...que eu devo pedir desculpas aos três. ......Eu forcei a Asumu a criar uma criança que não era dela. .........Aquela mulher podia parecer maleável, mas ela era muito mais afiada do que aparentava. ......Havia a chance dela descobrir. ...Mas ela criou o Battler, quem a amou como mãe, com toda a afeição que ela poderia dar a ele."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………所以我必須要向你們 3 人懺悔。……把和明日夢完全沒有血緣關係的嬰兒交給她。………她看起來挺文靜的，其實意外的敏銳。……說不定她早就已經注意到了。…不過，直到最後她也對把她視作母親的戰人，傾注了全部的愛情來養育。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………所以我必须要向你们 3 人忏悔。……把和明日梦完全没有血缘关系的婴儿交给她。………她看起来挺文静的，其实意外的敏锐。……说不定她早就已经注意到了。…不过，直到最后她也对把她视作母亲的战人，倾注了全部的爱情来养育。」

Umineko Project (UP): And in Kyrie and Battler's cases, ......he had to atone for an even greater sin.
Steam (ST): And in Kyrie and Battler's cases, ...he had to atone for an even greater sin.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、霧江と戦人には、……それ以上に罪を贖わなくてはならない。
Russian (RU): В случае Кирие и Баттлера...... он должен был искупить ещё больший грех.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E para Kyrie e Battler, ......ele precisava expiar um pecado ainda maior.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，對霧江和戰人，……必須要贖更多的罪才行。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，对雾江和战人，……必须要赎更多的罪才行。

Umineko Project (UP): He stole every moment of everyday family life that they should have shared as mother and son.
Steam (ST): He stole every moment of everyday family life that they should have shared as mother and son.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He stole every moment of everyday family life that they should have shared as mother and son.
PC Japanese (JP): 二人は、母親と息子の、普通の家庭ならば享受できたはずの温かな交流を、……全て奪われたのだ。
Russian (RU): Он забрал все моменты повседневной семейной жизни, которую они должны были разделить как мать и сын.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele roubou cada momento do dia‐a‐dia da vida familiar que os dois compartilhariam como mãe e filho.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這兩人之間，那母親與兒子的，普通的家庭中都能夠享受到的溫暖交流，……全都被奪走了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这两人之间，那母亲与儿子的，普通的家庭中都能够享受到的温暖交流，……全都被夺走了。

Umineko Project (UP): Until this very day, Kyrie had believed that Battler was Asumu's child.
Steam (ST): Until this very day, Kyrie had believed that Battler was Asumu's child.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Until this very day, Kyrie had believed that Battler was Asumu's child.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江は戦人を、明日夢の子と、今の今まで信じていた。
Russian (RU): До сего дня Кирие считала Баттлера ребёнком Асуму.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Até o dia de hoje, Kyrie sempre acreditou que Battler era filho de Asumu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江直到現在，都堅信戰人是明日夢的孩子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江直到现在，都坚信战人是明日梦的孩子。

Umineko Project (UP): Though she had acted kindly towards him on the surface, she had always kept a distance in her heart between herself and Asumu's son.
Steam (ST): Though she had acted kindly towards him on the surface, she had always kept a distance in her heart between herself and Asumu's son.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Though she had acted kindly towards him on the surface, she had always kept a distance in her heart between herself and Asumu's son.
PC Japanese (JP): 体面上は親しげにしながらも、明日夢の子と思い、心の中では敬遠していた。
Russian (RU): Она всегда в душе держала дистанцию между собой и сыном Асуму, хоть и с виду была добра к нему.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Embora, superficialmente, ela agisse de forma gentil com ele, Kyrie sempre manteve, em seu coração, uma distância entre ela própria e o filho de Asumu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 表面上她看起來很親切，但心裡還是覺得他是明日夢的孩子而疏遠著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 表面上她看起来很亲切，但心里还是觉得他是明日梦的孩子而疏远着。

Umineko Project (UP): Finally, ......Rudolf's conscience had been unable to bear seeing her like that.
Steam (ST): Finally, ...Rudolf's conscience had been unable to bear seeing her like that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Finally, ......Rudolf's conscience had been unable to bear seeing her like that.
PC Japanese (JP): もう、そんな彼女を見ることに、……留弗夫の良心は耐え切れなかったのだ。
Russian (RU): Наконец...... совесть Рудольфа больше не могла видеть её такой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Finalmente, ......a consciência de Rudolf foi incapaz de continuar suportando vê‐la dessa forma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看著這樣的她，……留弗夫已然受不了自己良心的譴責了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看着这样的她，……留弗夫已然受不了自己良心的谴责了。

Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie sank into a crouch, unable to speak.
Steam (ST): Kyrie sank into a crouch, unable to speak.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江は絶句しながらしゃがみ込む。
Russian (RU): Кирие опустилась на корточки, не в силах говорить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kyrie se encolheu, sem palavras.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江張口結舌地蹲了下來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江张口结舌地蹲了下来。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Umineko Project (UP): "......Feel free to curse me. In fact, I couldn't complain if you killed me where I stand. That's how horrible my sin against you is. .........This is the secret I wanted to confess before the cat box closes over us."
Steam (ST): "...Feel free to curse me. In fact, I couldn't complain if you killed me where I stand. That's how horrible my sin against you is. ...This is the secret I wanted to confess before the cat box closes over us."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Feel free to curse me. In fact, I couldn't complain if you killed me where I stand. That's how horrible my sin against you is. ......This is the secret I wanted to confess before the cat box closes over us."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……俺を罵ってくれ。いや、この場で殺してくれてもいい。俺はそれだけのことをした。………これが、猫箱にしまい込む前に、俺が白状したかった秘密だ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……俺を罵ってくれ。いや、この場で殺してくれてもいい。俺はそれだけのことをした。………これが、猫箱にしまい込む前に、俺が白状したかった秘密だ」
Russian (RU): "......Можешь проклинать меня. Или даже убить здесь и сейчас. Вот насколько ужасен мой грех. ......Я хотел признаться в этом до того, как над нами закроется крышка кошачьей коробки."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Fique à vontade para me odiar. Na verdade, eu não reclamaria se me matasse aqui e agora. Meu pecado é tão horrível a ponto de merecer isso. .........Esse é o segredo que eu queria confessar antes da caixa de gato nos fechar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……儘管罵我吧。不，現在就殺了我也可以。我做了那樣不可饒恕的事。………這就是，在貓箱完全關上之前，我想要坦白的秘密。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……尽管骂我吧。不，现在就杀了我也可以。我做了那样不可饶恕的事。………这就是，在猫箱完全关上之前，我想要坦白的秘密。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Battler...kun......"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Umineko Project (UP): "I'm so sorry, Kyrie. .........And to you, Battler........."
Steam (ST): "I'm so sorry, Kyrie. ...And to you, Battler......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I'm so sorry, Kyrie. ......And to you, Battler........."
Russian (RU): "Прости меня, Кирие. ......И ты, Баттлер........."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Me desculpa, Kyrie. .........E você também, Battler........."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「對不起，霧江。………戰人………」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「对不起，雾江。………战人………」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "Come to think of it, we've already gone through a ton of puzzles."
Steam (ST): "Come to think of it, we've already gone through a ton of puzzles."
PC Japanese (JP): 「気付けば、ずいぶんとたくさんの人に問題を出してもらったものね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「気付けば、ずいぶんとたくさんの人に問題を出してもらったものね」
Russian (RU): "Если подумать, мы уже разгадали тонну головоломок."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pensando nisso, nós já passamos por muitos enigmas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「才發現，咱們已經找不少人出過問題了呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「才发现，咱们已经找不少人出过问题了呢。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah. Now, there's only George onii‐chan, Jessica onee‐chan, Battler onii‐chan, and {f:5:Beatrice} left."
Steam (ST): "Yeah. Now, there's only George onii-chan, Jessica onee-chan, Battler onii-chan, and {f:5:Beatrice} left."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Yeah. Now, there's only George onii-chan, Jessica onee-chan, Battler onii-chan, and Beatrice left."
PC Japanese (JP): 「うん。あとは譲治お兄ちゃんと朱志香お姉ちゃんと、戦人お兄ちゃんとベアトリーチェだけだね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うん。あとは譲治お兄ちゃんと朱志香お姉ちゃんと、戦人お兄ちゃんとベアトリーチェだけだね」
Russian (RU): "Да. Остались только братик Джордж, сестрёнка Джессика, братик Баттлер и {f:5:Беатриче}."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. Agora, só falta o George onii‐chan, a Jessica onee‐chan, o Battler onii‐chan e a {f:5:Beatrice}."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯。之後就只剩讓治哥哥和朱志香姐姐，戰人哥哥和貝阿朵莉切了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯。之后就只剩让治哥哥和朱志香姐姐，战人哥哥和贝阿朵莉切了。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Umineko Project (UP): "Oh, they're finally here."
Steam (ST): "Oh, they're finally here."
PC Japanese (JP): 「お、やっと来たぜ？」
Russian (RU): "О, наконец‐то они пришли."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ah, elas chegaram."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「哦，終於來了啊？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哦，终于来了啊？」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "We've been waiting a painfully long time. We thought you might have forgotten about us."
Steam (ST): "We could hardly wait. Thought you might have forgotten about us."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "We could hardly wait. Thought you might have forgotten about us."
PC Japanese (JP): 「待ちくたびれたよ。僕たちのことを忘れてるんじゃないかと心配したよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「待ちくたびれたよ。僕たちのことを忘れてるんじゃないかと心配したよ」
Russian (RU): "Мы едва дождались. Думали, что вы забыли про нас."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ficamos um tempão esperando vocês. Pensamos até que tinham esquecido de nós."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「都等得不耐煩了。我還擔心是不是把我們給忘了呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「都等得不耐烦了。我还担心是不是把我们给忘了呢。」

Umineko Project (UP): Finally, we challenged George onii‐chan and Jessica onee‐chan.
Steam (ST): Finally, we challenged George onii-chan and Jessica onee-chan.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Finally, we challenged George onii-chan and Jessica onee-chan.
PC Japanese (JP): いよいよ、譲治お兄ちゃんと朱志香お姉ちゃんに挑戦だ。
Russian (RU): Мы наконец бросили вызов братику Джорджу и сестрёнке Джессике.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós finalmente vamos desafiar o George onii‐chan e a Jessica onee‐chan.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 終於，要向讓治哥哥和朱志香姐姐挑戰。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 终于，要向让治哥哥和朱志香姐姐挑战。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "Sorry to keep you two waiting. So, did you think up some incredibly hard ones for us?"
Steam (ST): "Sorry to keep you two waiting. So, did you think up some incredibly hard ones for us?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「お待たせしたわね。二人とも、飛び切り難しい問題を用意できたかしら？」
Russian (RU): "Извините, что заставили ждать. Так что, вы придумали для нас нечто невообразимо трудное?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Desculpe deixá‐los esperando. Então, pensaram em perguntas superdifíceis para nós?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「讓你們久等了。你們兩個，是都準備好超級難題了嗎？」

Umineko Project (UP): All of the boxes have the same probability of having a medal in them. Whether I open the red box, or change my mind and open a different box, the probability will be the same.
Steam (ST): All of the boxes have the same probability of having a medal in them. Whether I try to open the red box or change my mind and try the blue or green boxes, the probability will be the same.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): All of the boxes have the same probability of having a medal in them. Whether I try to open the red box or change my mind and try the blue or green boxes, the probability will be the same.
PC Japanese (JP): どの箱も、メダルが入ってる確率は同じなのだから、私がこの赤い箱を開けようと、やっぱり心変わりして青か緑の箱を開けようと、確率はどちらも同じなのだ。
Russian (RU): У всех этих коробок одинаковая вероятность того, что внутри медаль. Открою я красную коробку или же передумаю и выберу синюю или зелёную, вероятность останется той же.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todas as caixas têm a mesma probabilidade de haver uma medalha dentro delas. Seja abrindo a caixa vermelha, ou mudando de ideia e abrindo outra caixa, a probabilidade continua sendo a mesma.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「但是啊，小缘寿。其实那个蛋糕，如果是连佣人们也一起吃，而切成 20 份的蛋糕呢？」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "This is a party, right? It's not fair that the servants don't get any cake, don't you think? So, let's say it was originally a twenty‐slice cake. The servants took out five slices, then redecorated it as a fifteen‐slice cake and let you choose a slice. If so, what would your chances of choosing the right slice be?"
Steam (ST): "This is a party, right? It's not fair that the servants don't get any cake, don't you think? So, let's say it was originally a 20 slice cake. The servants took out 5 slices, then redecorated it as a 15 slice cake and let you choose a slice. If so, what would your chances of choosing the right slice be?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "This is a party, right? It's not fair that the servants don't get any cake, don't you think? So, let's say it was originally a 20 slice cake. The servants took out five slices, then redecorated it as a 15 slice cake and let you choose a slice. If so, what would your chances of choosing the right slice be?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「今日はお祭りだもの。使用人の人だけケーキなしなんて意地悪でしょう？　だから本当は２０切れのケーキがあったの。それを使用人分５切れ抜いて、１５切れにして飾り直して、そこから縁寿ちゃんに選んでもらった、……としたら。縁寿ちゃんが選んだケーキの当たる確率は本当はいくつだったと思う？」
Russian (RU): "Это же вечеринка. Нечестно, если слугам не достанется торт, правда? Поэтому допустим, что изначально было 20 кусков. Слуги взяли пять, затем переделали его так, чтобы стало 15 кусков, и дали тебе выбрать. Какова в таком случае вероятность выбрать правильный кусок?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isto é uma festa, não é? Não é justo que os serviçais fiquem sem bolo, não concorda? Por isso, vamos dizer que originalmente eram vinte fatias de bolo. Os serviçais tiraram cinco fatias, o reorganizaram em quinze fatias e deixaram você escolher uma. Sendo assim, quais seriam as suas chances de escolher a fatia certa?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「今天是大慶祝嘛。只有傭人們吃不到蛋糕也太過分了吧？所以原本是要切成 20 份的。傭人們先取走了 5 份，將剩下的 15 份重新擺放裝飾，之後再讓小緣壽來選，……的話。小緣壽所選的蛋糕抽中杏仁的機率會是多少呢？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「今天是大庆祝嘛。只有佣人们吃不到蛋糕也太过分了吧？所以原本是要切成 20 份的。佣人们先取走了 5 份，将剩下的 15 份重新摆放装饰，之后再让小缘寿来选，……的话。小缘寿所选的蛋糕抽中杏仁的几率会是多少呢？」

Umineko Project (UP): If there were really twenty slices, .........then the chances would be 1 in 20.
Steam (ST): If there really were 20 slices, ......then the chances would be 1 in 20.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If there were really 20 slices, .........then the chances would be one in 20.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 原本是 20 份的话，………不就是 20 分之 1 嘛。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "However, the servants know where the almond is, so they chose five slices for themselves that had no almonds. In other words, they removed five {i:losing} slices. That would mean your chances of winning were 1 in 15, not 1 in 20."
Steam (ST): "However, the servants know where the almond is, so they chose 5 slices for themselves that had no almonds. In other words, they removed 5 losing slices. That would mean your chances of winning were 1 in 15, not 1 in 20."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "However, the servants know where the almond is, so they chose five slices for themselves that had no almonds. In other words, they removed five losing slices. That would mean your chances of winning were one in 15, not one in 20."
PC Japanese (JP): 「でも、使用人の人たちはアーモンドの入ってない場所を知ってたから、そこを避けてケーキを５切れもらったのよ。つまり、彼らはハズレを５個、間引いてくれていたというわけ。だから確率は２０分の１じゃなく、１５分の１になる。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「でも、使用人の人たちはアーモンドの入ってない場所を知ってたから、そこを避けてケーキを５切れもらったのよ。つまり、彼らはハズレを５個、間引いてくれていたというわけ。だから確率は２０分の１じゃなく、１５分の１になる」
Russian (RU): "Однако слуги знали, в каком миндаль, и поэтому выбрали пять кусков, в которых его не было. Так они убрали пять {i:проигрышных} кусков. Получается, твои шансы на победу были один из 15, а не один из 20."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Contudo, os serviçais sabiam onde estava a amêndoa, por isso eles escolheram cinco fatias nas quais ela não estava presente. Ou seja, eles removeram cinco fatias {i:perdedoras}. Isso significaria que suas chances de vencer eram de 1 em 15, e não 1 em 20."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「但是，佣人们是知道哪里没有杏仁的，特别避开了杏仁取走了 5 块。也就是说，他们拿走了 5 个错误选项。所以几率不是 20 分之 1，而是 15 分之 1。」

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……ハズレを間引いたんだから、その分、当たる確率が上がるのは当然だよ」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George

Steam (ST): When she saw that Ange was finally asleep, Beato spoke softly.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando viu que Ange finalmente havia dormido, Beato falou gentilmente.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「诸位，安静。……缘寿睡着了。」

Umineko Project (UP): When she said those words, the pleasant noise that had filled the room softly returned to silence.{n}Everyone looked down upon Ange's sleeping face.
Steam (ST): When she spoke, the peaceful clatter that filled the room fell silent. Everyone looked down into Ange's sleeping face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When she spoke, the peaceful clatter that filled the room fell silent. Everyone looked down into Ange's sleeping face.
PC Japanese (JP): すると、一同の和やかな喧騒は、すぅっと静かになった。みんなが、じっと縁寿の寝顔を見ている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): すると、一同の和やかな喧騒は、すぅっと静かになった。{n}みんなが、じっと縁寿の寝顔を見ている。

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Each of them wore an affectionate gaze, as if they'd just watched a baby finally drift to sleep.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 就好像是，在以慈爱的眼神守望终于睡着的小婴儿一样。

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Umineko Project (UP): "Of course she did. ......She might not feel that strongly about it now, but one day, she will surely remember tonight's party and appreciate how fun it was."
Steam (ST): "But of course. ...The feeling might not be so strong now, but one day, she will surely remember tonight's party and understand how fun it was."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "But of course. ......It might not feel so strong now, but one day, she will surely remember tonight's party and understand how fun it was."
PC Japanese (JP): 「当然であろうが。……今は、そこまでは感じぬかもしれぬ。しかしやがて、今夜のパーティーのことを思い出し、それがどれほど楽しかったかを、噛み締めてくれるであろう。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「当然であろうが。……今は、そこまでは感じぬかもしれぬ。しかしやがて、今夜のパーティーのことを思い出し、それがどれほど楽しかったかを、噛み締めてくれるであろう」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Umineko Project (UP): "So long, my granddaughter. .........I was so pleased to have this chance to play with you again after twelve years. ......It matters not if you forget everything about me. Remember me as an arrogant despot. ......But, every now and then, try to remember how much I adored you."
Steam (ST): "So long, my granddaughter. ...I was so pleased to have this chance to play with you again after 12 years. ...It matters not if you forget everything about me. Remember me as an arrogant despot. ...But, every now and then, just try and remember how much I adored you."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "So long, my granddaughter. ......I was so pleased to have this chance to play with you again after 12 years. ......It matters not if you forget everything about me. Remember me as an arrogant despot. ......But, every now and then, try and remember how much I adored you."
PC Japanese (JP): 「さらばだ、我が孫よ。………お祖父ちゃんは、１２年ぶりに遊べて、嬉しかったぞ。……私のことを何も覚えていなくてもよい。傲慢なる暴君と記憶してくれてもよい。……だがたまには、目に入れても痛くないほどに可愛がっていたことも、思い出しておくれ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さらばだ、我が孫よ。………お祖父ちゃんは、１２年ぶりに遊べて、嬉しかったぞ。……私のことを何も覚えていなくてもよい。傲慢なる暴君と記憶してくれてもよい。……だがたまには、目に入れても痛くないほどに可愛がっていたことも、思い出しておくれ」
Russian (RU): "Прощай, внучка. ......Я был очень рад получить возможность снова поиграть с тобой спустя 12 лет. ......Неважно, если ты всё обо мне забудешь. Запомни меня как высокомерного деспота. ......Но вспоминай иногда, как сильно я любил тебя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Adeus, minha netinha. .........Foi muito agradável ter esta oportunidade para brincar com você novamente depois de doze anos. ......Não importa se irá se esquecer de mim. Lembre de mim como um arrogante déspota. ......Mas, de vez em quando, tente lembrar o quanto eu a adorava."

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Umineko Project (UP): "She will remember. .........Ange‐san. You have a long life ahead of you. Even after twelve years, there is still much for you to experience. I pray that you find this life meaningful and worthwhile."
Steam (ST): "She will remember. ...Ange-san, you have a long life ahead of you. Even after 12 years, there is still much for you to experience. I pray that you find this life meaningful and worthwhile."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "She will remember. ......Ange-san. You have a long life ahead of you. Even after 12 years, there is still much for you to experience. I pray that you find this life meaningful and worthwhile."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「思い出しますとも。………縁寿さん。あんたの人生は長い。１２年を経ても、まだまだ長い。その人生が有意義なものになることを、祈っております」
Russian (RU): "Она будет помнить. ......Энджи. У вас впереди долгая жизнь. Даже спустя 12 лет вы ещё многое можете испытать. Я молюсь, чтобы вы посчитали эту жизнь значимой и стоящей."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ela vai lembrar. .........Ange‐san. Você tem uma longa vida pela frente. Mesmo após doze anos, ainda há muito o que viver e experimentar. Eu rezo para que perceba o significado e o valor dessa vida."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「一定會想起來的。………緣壽小姐。你的人生是很長的。就算過去了 12 年，後面依舊很長。願你此後的人生，能變得更有意義。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「一定会想起来的。………缘寿小姐。你的人生是很长的。就算过去了 12 年，后面依旧很长。愿你此后的人生，能变得更有意义。」

Umineko Project (UP): "......You are the final grandchild and daughter of the Ushiromiya family. We all pray for your happiness."
Steam (ST): "...You are the final grandchild and daughter of the Ushiromiya family. All of us pray for your happiness."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Você é a última neta e filha da família Ushiromiya. Todos nós rezamos para que encontre a felicidade."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……你是，右代宫家全员的，最后的孙女。我们所有人，都会祈祷你过得幸福的。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Umineko Project (UP): "Ange‐chan. Stay well. ......Happiness isn't something you find, it's something you make. And in fact, memories work the same way."
Steam (ST): "Ange-chan, stay well. ...Happiness isn't something you find, it's something you make. And in fact, memories work the same way."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ange-chan. Stay well. ......Happiness isn't something you find, it's something you make. And in fact, memories work the same way."
PC Japanese (JP): 「縁寿ちゃん。お元気で。……幸せは見つけるものでなく、作るものです。思い出も、実は同じなんですよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「縁寿ちゃん。お元気で。……幸せは見つけるものでなく、作るものです。思い出も、実は同じなんですよ」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ange‐chan. Se cuide. ......A felicidade não é algo que você encontra, mas algo que você cria. As memórias também funcionam da mesma forma."

Steam (ST): "True. ...There are some things that we only truly understand when we think back on them years later."

Russian (RU): "Верно. Даже не опускается занавес. Всё просто останется как есть. Энджи спит. Остальные из нас присматривают за ней. Мы всегда будем с ней."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso mesmo. Sequer é uma cortina. É exatamente como somos agora.{n}A Ange‐chan tá dormindo tranquilamente. Nós estamos ao lado dela, a observando com muito afeto. ......Nós sempre estaremos com ela."

Umineko Project (UP): All of them still wore warm smiles, but the sound of sniffling came from several places throughout the room...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf

Steam (ST): "Ange, live life strongly. ...Our blood flows through your veins. That'll definitely bring you strength."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「縁寿。力強く生きろよ。……俺たちの血が流れてるんだ。絶対にその力はあるさ」

Steam (ST): "I'll make sure...she finds happiness. As long as she wants it herself..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Umineko Project (UP): "Ange...... Don't forget. Your self, your happiness, your fate. You're the one who creates all of these things. Only you can choose. Those aren't things that someone else can give you, and they aren't things that someone else can hide from you. ......Remember."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「縁寿……。忘れるんじゃないぜ。自分も、幸せも、運命も。作るのは自分なんだ。自分だけが決められる。それは誰かに与えられるものでも、そして誰かに隠されて探すものでもない。……それを、忘れるんじゃないぜ」
Russian (RU): "Энджи...... Не забудь. Ты сама, твоё счастье, твоя судьба. Именно ты создаёшь всё это. Только тебе выбирать. Другие не могут дать тебе или же скрыть это от тебя. ......Помни."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ange...... Não se esqueça. Não esqueça de si, da sua felicidade, do seu destino.{n}É você quem cria todas essas coisas. Apenas você pode escolher. Não são coisas que alguém pode dar a você, não são coisas que alguém possa esconder de você. ......Lembre‐se."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「缘寿……。不许忘了。不论是自己，还是幸福，还是命运，创造它们的都是自己。只有自己能作决定。这不是谁能给予你的，也不是被谁藏起来让你去找的。……你可，别把这给忘了。」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não sei. Mas eu sei que ela é esperta. Tenho certeza que ela aprenderá algo com isso."

Speaker: Shannon
Umineko Project (UP): "......Ange‐sama. I pray that you are guided along the right path as you move on to the future."
Steam (ST): "...Ange-sama, I pray that you're guided along the right path as you move towards the future."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Ange-sama. I pray that you are guided along the right path as you move on to the future."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……缘寿小姐。愿您能被引导向正确的未来上。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "Ange. .........Were you able to remember everyone, at least a little bit?"
Steam (ST): "Ange, ...were you able to remember everyone, at least a little bit?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ange. ......Were you able to remember everyone, at least a little bit?"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ange. .........Você foi capaz de se lembrar de todo mundo, mesmo que só um pouquinho?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「缘寿。………有没有稍微忆起些大家的事情呢？」

Umineko Project (UP): Of course, Ange didn't answer in her sleep.{n}But Battler continued.
Steam (ST): Of course, Ange didn't answer in her sleep. But Battler continued.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Of course, Ange didn't answer in her sleep. But Battler continued.
PC Japanese (JP): もちろん、すやすやと眠る縁寿が答えるはずもない。しかし戦人は、続ける。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): もちろん、すやすやと眠る縁寿が答えるはずもない。{n}しかし戦人は、続ける。

Chinese Simplified (CN): 当然，睡得正香的缘寿不可能作出回答。{n}不过战人继续说。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "It's true that the Ushiromiyas are a strange family. We're super‐rich, and that's given rise to all sorts of rumors and stories. ......However, all of those are just speculation made up by people outside the island."
Steam (ST): "It's true that the Ushiromiyas are a strange family. We're super-rich, and that's given rise to all sorts of rumors and stories. ...However, that's all speculation made by people outside the island."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It's true that the Ushiromiyas are a strange family. We're super-rich, and that's given rise to all sorts of rumors and stories. ......However, all of those are just speculation made up by people outside the island."
PC Japanese (JP): 「確かに右代宮家は、ちょいと変わった一族だ。大金持ちだし、それを巡っておかしな噂話も飛び交っただろう。……しかしそんなのは全て、島の外の連中の勝手な憶測だ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「確かに右代宮家は、ちょいと変わった一族だ。大金持ちだし、それを巡っておかしな噂話も飛び交っただろう。……しかしそんなのは全て、島の外の連中の勝手な憶測だ」
Russian (RU): "Да, Уширомия — странная семья. Мы очень богаты, и это породило всевозможные слухи и истории. ......Но всё это лишь спекуляция людей за пределами острова."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É verdade que os Ushiromiyas são uma família estranha. Nós somos super‐ricos, e isso fez surgir todo tipo de histórias e rumores. ......Mas tudo isso não passa de especulações de pessoas de fora da ilha."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「的確右代宮家是比較奇怪的一家人。因為是有錢人家，圍繞著一家人的奇怪傳聞一定是滿天飛吧。……不過那些都是，島外那幫傢伙們的無端臆測。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「的确右代宫家是比较奇怪的一家人。因为是有钱人家，围绕着一家人的奇怪传闻一定是满天飞吧。……不过那些都是，岛外那帮家伙们的无端臆测。」

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Umineko Project (UP): "......Young as you were, no one will blame you for forgetting the memories that were so kind to you. But even so, you must remember, for their sakes. ......It is not a sin to forget. ......The sin.....is to refuse to remember."
Steam (ST): "...No one will blame you for forgetting these kind memories, young as you were. But even so, you must remember. ...It is not a sin to forget. ...But to not remember again...is a sin."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......No one will blame you for forgetting these kind memories, young as you were. But even so, you must remember. ......It is not a sin to forget. ......But to not remember again...is a sin."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……幼さゆえに、やさしき思い出を記憶に留められなかったそなたを、誰も責めはせぬ。しかしそれでも、思い出してやれ。……忘れることが罪ではない。……思い出さぬことが、罪なのだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……幼さゆえに、やさしき思い出を記憶に留められなかったそなたを、誰も責めはせぬ。しかしそれでも、思い出してやれ。……忘れることが罪ではない。……思い出さぬことが、罪なのだ」
Russian (RU): "......Никто не станет винить тебя, если ты, такая юная, забудешь подобные воспоминания. Но всё же, ты должна вспомнить. ......Забыть — не грех. ......Грех... не вспомнить снова."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Jovem como é, ninguém irá culpá‐la por esquecer memórias que eram tão queridas a você. Mas, mesmo assim, você deve lembrar, por eles. ......Esquecer não é um pecado. ......O pecado.....é se recusar a lembrar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……沒有人會責備，由於年幼而沒能留住溫柔回憶的汝。但即便如此，也要想起來。……忘記並不是罪。……想不起來，才是罪。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……没有人会责备，由于年幼而没能留住温柔回忆的汝。但即便如此，也要想起来。……忘记并不是罪。……想不起来，才是罪。」

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Umineko Project (UP): "It goes without saying......that this is an illusion. You cannot come to Rokkenjima on October 4th, 1986. This whole party we shared was all a magical illusion, created by the Game Master, Battler."
Steam (ST): "It goes without saying... that this is an illusion. You cannot come to Rokkenjima on October 4th, 1986. This whole party we shared was all a magical illusion, created by the Game Master, Battler."

Umineko Project (UP): The servants left and closed the parlor door.{n}As Ange slept, she was wrapped up in the soft sound of the rain.
Steam (ST): The servants left and closed the parlor door. As Ange slept, she was wrapped up in the soft sound of the rain.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The servants left and closed the parlor door. As Ange slept, she was wrapped up in the soft sound of the rain.
PC Japanese (JP): 使用人たちが去った後の客間を、静かな雨の音が閉ざす。すやすやと眠る縁寿を、静かに包み込む。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 使用人たちが去った後の客間を、静かな雨の音が閉ざす。{n}すやすやと眠る縁寿を、静かに包み込む。
Russian (RU): Слуги вышли и закрыли дверь гостиной.{n}Спящую Энджи окутал тихий шум дождя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os serviçais foram embora e fecharam a porta da sala de visitas.{n}Enquanto Ange dormia, ela foi envolvida pelo suave som da chuva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 傭人們離去後的客廳，被靜謐的雨聲所關閉。{n}將呼呼睡著的緣壽，靜靜地包裹在裡面。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 佣人们离去后的客厅，被静谧的雨声所关闭。{n}将呼呼睡着的缘寿，静静地包裹在里面。

Umineko Project (UP): Surely, she was reliving that fun evening once more in her dreams......
Steam (ST): Surely, she was reliving that fun evening once more in her dreams...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Surely, she was reliving that fun evening once more in her dreams......
PC Japanese (JP): きっと、楽しかった時間を、もう一度夢で思い返しているに違いなかった……。
Russian (RU): Несомненно, она снова переживала в своих снах этот весёлый вечер......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Certamente, ela estava revivendo aquela noite divertida em seus sonhos mais uma vez......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那快樂的時光，一定會再一次在夢中憶起……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那快乐的时光，一定会再一次在梦中忆起……。
